title: NFL Week Three
author: VD
content_html: This is the weekly open NFL post. I’m thinking All Day will bring the thunder against San Francisco once Favre shows that they can’t stack the box against him. I’m hoping Matt Forte will finally get rolling against a bad run defense – although coaches changing defensive priorities often shows the obvious to be nothing of the sort. I’m wondering what is wrong with Clinton Portis, and I will be very amused if the Titans start out 0-3.
content_text: This is the weekly open NFL post.  I’m thinking All Day will bring the thunder against San Francisco once Favre shows that they can’t stack the box against him.  I’m hoping Matt Forte will finally get rolling against a bad run defense – although coaches changing defensive priorities often shows the obvious to be nothing of the sort.  I’m wondering what is wrong with Clinton Portis, and I will be very amused if the Titans start out 0-3.
